Title: Exempts veterans organizations in New York city from city sewer and water charges
Summary: Exempts veterans organizations in New York city, as defined in section 452 of the real property tax law, from payment of city sewer and water charges.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-j, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting veterans organizations in New York city from sewer and water charges
